mapper.update: update notice set noti_view_cnt = noti_view_cnt + 1 where noti_no = #{noti_no}
mapper.select: select noti_no, noti_title, noti_ctnts, noti_date, noti_view_cnt, noti_pic, noti_path from notice where noti_no = #{noti_no}

select noti_no, noti_title, noti_ctnts, noti_date, noti_pic, noti_path, noti_view_cnt from notice
where noti_title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
where noti_no like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by noti_no desc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select count(noti_no) cnt from notice
where noti_title like concat('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
where noti_no like concat('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into notice (noti_no, noti_title, noti_ctnts, noti_date, noti_pic, noti_path ) values (0, #{noti_title}, #{noti_ctnts}, now(), #{noti_pic}, #{noti_path})
